item.title: Elizabeth
item.description: Reality Jumping #PeopleAlternate-Reality Elizabeth, or just Beth, as I called her, was/is my sister, but not in this universe. I dreamwalked into an alternate reality once, and she was there.

item.title: Time Travel
item.description: Abilities #Active-AbilityAbilities Time travel is, a subject. This travel works a little different to movie time travel. If you go back, depending on how far, you go back to the body you had at that time.
